page.title: 02A house
page.content: One house is a large, red bricked building. It has a green door and green window frames. There is a new glass porch in front of the door and even though it is new, it is in need of a clean.}The family, who live inside, are{Scottish}and they miss Scotland badly. They have four boys and a grandmother, they make the house a litlle messy at times and the parents find it very expensive to buy food for them all today. The father, works in a sweet shop and the mother works in a supermarket. Their back garden is small. There is a patio lined with flowers and a grass patch where{the family}sunbathes occasionally. They did have a swing in the garden for the young children. (continued on page 3)
